website_summaries.verdict: Bandits beware, this sophisticated motorcycle alarm offers a comprehensive anti-theft solution.
pros: This anti-theft device combines a 6-millimeter steel pin brake disc lock with a loud 110-decibel alarm for maximum security
The alarm will automatically activate when it senses any vibration or shock, and is easy to lock with a single push of a button
Fits most motorcycles and scooters, including cruisers, choppers, sport bikes, and racing bikes
cons: The lock is strong, but some users have reported alarm malfunctions in heavy rain and cold

website_summaries.verdict: One of the few versatile disc brake locks meant for use on a wide variety of vehicles.
pros: Unique body profile is narrow enough to fit onto some vehicles smaller than a motorcycle, making it great for scooters, mopeds, and some bicycles
cons: The volume of the alarm may be too quiet to hear in loud, urban environments

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective security.
customer_reviews.text: For under $40 this is a great way to give you a little more security when leaving your motorcycle. I really like it. It's not overly sensitive. When I lock it on my bike it will beep once to let you know that it's armed. When I just sit on my bike it will beep once to give a warning. If you bump it again the alarm will go off. To shut off the alarm you will either have to unlock it or wait 60 seconds. It's not overly loud but will draw attention. The safety cable is a nice touch. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher Arc

customer_reviews.title: When I go to remove my cover it triggers the little warning beep which is nice. It's just a little 3 beeps to let ...
customer_reviews.text: It has not been tested with someone trying to steal it and hopefully that does not happen, but the alarm feels solid and it's very loud. When I go to remove my cover it triggers the little warning beep which is nice. It's just a little 3 beeps to let you know if you keep messing with me I'm going to go off on you. There is a very nice carrying case that fits onto your belt which I love. The biggest adjustment to using a motorcycle vs a car is getting use to only carrying what you have on you and this carrying case makes that just a little bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: To.Ze

customer_reviews.title: Its a good lock, motion detection will go off in the wind. Probably better options for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment in the middle of a large city so naturally I need to lock my bike up well. This lock makes the bike unmoveable without taking off the front tire. The motion detection is neat in theory, but is highly too sensitive. If you tarp your bike the wind will make the alarm go off. Got a call in the middle of my work day that my bike alarm is going off. It being an old bike with no such built in alarm system I knew it was the disc lock. Took the batteries out and just use it as a lock that looks high tech. Knock on wood I haven't had my motorcycle pitched yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: The alarm is not that loud.
customer_reviews.text: The brake lock works fine and fits my 2017 Honda CB500X well. I mount it in the front wheel. I am giving this 3 stars because neither the alarm is loud enough (perhaps 110dB does not cut it) nor it lasts long enough. In my opinion the alarm should last longer than 10 seconds. Also, the other days the wind was blowing and shaking the bike. The alarm went off and I could barely hear it from inside my home which is about 20 yards away from where I park my bike. So, as a deterrent this might work, but don't expect too much.
customer_reviews.author: Vasileios Paschalidis

customer_reviews.title: worthless-would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had these on front and rear tires. During an attempted theft of my BMW RR1000, both were cut off. The person damaged the brakes, but I'm not sure if that was caused by the alarm and/or the person. I didn't hear the alarms and neither did my neighbors, so I would consider this product useless. I have other locking mechanisms and a third party tilt alarm also, so fortunately my bike was not actually stolen. I'm glad this was not my only anti-theft system.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Duran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, LOUD lock!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I bought it to secure a storage POD I had outside for a few weeks during a remodel, and felt truly secure knowing how well it worked. I’m going to use it for a little extra safety around my helmet this spring when I start riding regularly again. Easy to use, and LOUD! Kinda heavy-ish, but not a big deal if you have side bags. It’s designed for the brake disks, but I don’t think I’ll bother. Overall, pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Ballsagna

customer_reviews.title: Disc lock satisfaction.
customer_reviews.text: This disc lock is very easy to install and remove from my bike. The reminder cable that attaches from the lock to some portion of the bike is handy for both letting you know that the disc alarm has been installed and set as well as a reminder of not to drive away with it still attached to the brake disc on the bike. If the alarm is activated, it is loud enough to alert passers by of a possible theft situation. I am using this lock on my ebike as an additional protection to a thick U lock. It gives me one more level of peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a week, loved it. Then it rained and now the alarm does not work. Claims to be waterproof but it's really not. Put in rice with the new batteries and it's working. However, no sealent, gasket or anything else to protect it from water. I have corrosion on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This product is not waterproof at all. Mine stopped working only a few months after I started using it. It still locks but it doesn't make any sounds and "no" it has nothing to do with the batteries being bad.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I had never seen one of these before. I work at a prison and it is a requirement to have one of these if I ride my bike. Overall it is a pain to use but that may just be me. It does what it is supposed to do and nobody is going to move your bike without creating a scene
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for great price.
customer_reviews.text: Received product today. Seems very sturdy and well built. Works exactly as described. Alarm is very loud. The pin seems too large to fit through the holes in my rotor, but it fits nicely locking on the inside part of rotor. Sensitivity seems almost perfect. I would suggest if using with a bike cover, put the reminder cable on the handlebar, put cover on, then lift up front of cover enough to attach the reminder cable to lock and lock the rotor. Can’t say much about the weather resistance as I just received it and it will be under the bike cover anyways. Came with extra batteries, three keys, and reminder cable.
customer_reviews.author: April B.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Nice and loud!
customer_reviews.text: This bike alarm is great. Living in Hawaii, I've had 2 mopeds stolen over the past 2 years, so I needed an alarm solution. I put this alarm/lock on my front tire, and use a large lock on the back tire. This alarm is nice and loud. I had a neighbor accidentally bump into my bike the other day, and I heard it going off inside my apartment on the 3rd floor. Great price, and build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Luke R.

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if it were actually waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about a week. First time it got rained on, it shorted out, alarm buzzed (softly) all night apparently - was buzzing out in the morning. Maybe my unit was defective, but a shorted out alarm makes this thing even less useful than a regular non-alarmed version. Shame because otherwise the alarm sensitivity was about where I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Mo

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use this on my motorcycle for a couple of weeks until it rained. After it rained, the device stopped working. I opened it and dried everything off and figured I'd give it another try, but after a few days, it stopped working again. I opened it up to find the batteries corroded...so I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Guidry

customer_reviews.title: a piece of junk now locked closed on my bike!!
customer_reviews.text: Not trusting it after awhile to be on my wheels I then put on my handlebars....and lo and behold it is now stuck, permanently closed, not responding to the key.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Alison Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Small price to pay for scooter theft protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my husband's 150cc scooter and gives us peace of mind that the sound may run off a thief. Very loud alarm that will be extra loud echoing off our carport walls! He didn't have high hopes for it but was really impressed once he tested it out. Motion sensitivity is pretty high but not too much. The wheel has to roll a couple inches or so to trigger the alarm. It won't go off if the scooter is just bumped into.
customer_reviews.author: GoodEnoughNails

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect!!! I was a little hesitant and confused about how it works but after watching a YouTube video it’s so easy...the alarm isn’t extremely loud which is good because I live in a cery quiet neighborhood however it’s loud enough to get someone’s attention...even scare the predator...I really like how small and compact it is and how easy it is to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki TwoStep

customer_reviews.title: Heafty and Safe
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm lock so far. Makes me feel at ease. But heavy for something so small. Comes with a pouch, extra batteries, the lock, thin wire cord lock, and keys. I use this for my Rad Power bike which was well over 1.5k and I wanted as much security as a I could to add to my U lock. Feels safe. Would recommend. Hasn't seen rain wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering just a simple caliper lock, dont waste your money and buy this one. It beeps loud and has the same protection. This is well worth the money and has a pretty sensitive motion detector. You can sit on the bike and it wont go off, but if you move it at all it will go off.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and packaged nicely. The instructions are easy to understand and comes ready to use out of the box. Included is a convenient carrying case for the allen wrench that is needed to replace the batteries. It isn't going to stop a determined thief but it sure will deter them. Alarm is loud enough to be heard by the neighbors. Just remember to put it on the back wheel so if you forget to take it off it doesn't throw you over the handle bars lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the $, Excellent. Great deal. Hide it, on rear disc.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived. Everything there. Nice! I put it on the rear disc. it's more out of sight. For the $, Excellent" I didn't rate water, because it hasn't rained & I didn't buy it, to repel water, or leave bike in the rain. By chance if that happens, a plastic bag can solve that. I will definitely buy from this company again. If they make another one that's Louder" I will purchase
customer_reviews.author: True Reviews"

customer_reviews.title: Security is great, alarm is touchy.
customer_reviews.text: This this works great to keep your bike secure. The lock is solid and the alarm is super loud if someone even bumps your bike. My only complaint is that the alarm randomly chirps (4 in a row) every hour or so. It doesn't bother me too much but I have co-workers that sit right next to where I park and I am embarrassed every time is goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Steen

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels solid, has an obnoxious alarm. ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels solid, has an obnoxious alarm. My only complaint is that the reminder cable could/should be a more obnoxious color. I still wouldn't take my bike to Wal-Mart, but that is a testament to Wal-Mart and not this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Ekah

customer_reviews.title: 3 weeks later lock will not lock.
customer_reviews.text: Like usual i read the reviews so i baught it. Goes on easy and alarms is audible. After about 3 weeks of usage the lock will not lock. Even pressing down with the key and turning the key manually the unit will no longer lock. Alarms still sounds great but will not work till the lock is locked. Was gonna order a second one but now im not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motion Sensor not accurate and carrying case faulty
customer_reviews.text: I have used lock on a F800GS and while it will prevent an easy roll off the alarm fails to sound 50% of the time while testing. Also i tried to strap lock with supplied case to my rack and straps ripped off on 1st use while tightening ,good thing i wasn't doing 60 MPH on the freeway. 3 stars for water rating because of unknown reliability in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: ALMA C.

customer_reviews.title: LOUD! Easy to use and discrete
customer_reviews.text: First reaction on the lock is, it is loud! Bought it to deter people and kids from messing with or trying to sit on my 150cc scooter in my apartment building. Neighbors have had issues with kids climbing on their bikes and damaging mirrors and stuff. Tested it and I can hear it in my apartment right above from the underground garage! Perfect The only thing is I wish the motion/vibration sensor was more sensitive. I am actually able to sit on or open my underseat storage on my scooter without it chirping. Only when I physically shake the handlebars does it go off.
customer_reviews.author: Steffan S.

customer_reviews.title: Alarm is too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive. Prone to setting off its very loud and annoying alarm if you are not careful. Made this mistake at 6am. It would be great if it was simple to remove without setting it off. It is not difficult now, but you have to pay special attention. I only use it when I leave the bike for an extended period of time
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Junk works fine for two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Not water proof malfunctioned after two weeks ...would not recommend this device
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Still works.
customer_reviews.text: edit: Almost a year now and still works with OG batteries. Survived rain and freezing temps under flimsy cover. 5 months and still going, loud enough that I can hear it from second floor facing window. Wind gives of warning beeps, but no false alarms yet. It is sensitive but only if the wheel moves or steering turns.
customer_reviews.author: cemsicles

customer_reviews.title: Great Alarm, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is exactly what my husband wanted for his Harley. He loves it because it is very loud, but doesn't stay on too long and is not obnoxious. It's a great alarm and warning for people/kids who may climb or mess with his bike when parked places. It's super easy to use and the reminder cable helps him remember to remove it. Great item and SO GLAD we got this for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap protection
customer_reviews.text: Thief's don't want to waste time stealing a bike with any kind of anti thief device on them. I bought two of these for front and rear wheels. Stayed in Va. overnight last year. When I came out in the morning someone went through my saddlebags. At least the bike was there. As far as the alarm is concerned it really is not that loud.
customer_reviews.author: paul carr

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bought on recommendation from fellow rider
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bought on recommendation from fellow rider. Received as promised, works great and very easy to use. Sensitivity is perfect. Once bike is jostled.alarm activates and loud. Comes with case, alen wrench to change batteries and spare batteries. Very sturdy construction, highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good anti-theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deterrent, would buy again, fits perfect, but the alarm isn't loud enough to make anybody aware unless they were close by, you can only expect so much from such a small device. It would be pretty hard to get the lock off unless you had lots of time and tools. Just pray you never lose your keys on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: Effective alarm, but has lost some sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Really like this lock and alarm, however, over just a month's time the alarm has lost some sensitivity. I live in New York City so garbage trucks and other loud cars will drive by my parked bike all the time; the alarm has never been triggered this way. However, when I first got it, if I even sat on the bike the alarm would beep. Now, I can sit on the bike - have even started it up on accident, forgetting the lock was on - and it didn't sound. But, in general I think this is a good system and I feel much more comfortable leaving my bike on the street with it.
customer_reviews.author: rwillia005

customer_reviews.title: Lock fits my needs
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recently got his motorcycle stolen. I got this as a deterrent to keep mine from being ridden off like his was. The alarm is not real loud but I didn't get it for that. If you can't turn the wheel you can't ride it off, whomever will have to pick bike up and carry it off.
customer_reviews.author: H2Odog477

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this alarm because I wasn't able to lock my front tire and I live in a part of town where the homeless population has moved to my neighborhood. Putting the alarm on the bike is fairly easy. You do have to do a little searching to get the pin inside the disc. If the cord is pulled just a tiny bit, it sounds off a warning. Anything harder, it will sound the alarm. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: I use this every day.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this every day for my commute for over a year on my VStar 950. It has been in pouring rain, hail storms, and super hot summer days. Works great. Motion detection is alright. It kept going off during the hail storm, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for bike security.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and that was great, because I needed it. Works great on my electric mountain bike. Simple to use and install on the disc brake. So far, very great product. Built extremely well and very solid. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: James o. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Decent deterrent for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Just the simple fact that it comes with an extra set of batteries is a good deal. seems durable and only less slightly hefty than an old Xena lock I had but the internal for the alarm stopped working (albeit after 7-8 years of use). I needed a cheap & quick alternative and this did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my trip from Baltimore to New Orleans. I felt more secure when staying at hotels. The alarm is sensitive and has a high pitch, hard to miss alarm. It poured down raining overnight and I didn't have one problem with the electronics or rust.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every bike owner
customer_reviews.text: I used to own an old bike and did not care if someone steals it. Now that I have a brand new bike I want to protect it. Super easy to use it and I love the fact it's a break lock plus an alarm. It works well - if someone shakes the bike the alarm will go off.
customer_reviews.author: RaiRai

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Highly Reactive Alarm
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is very loud. Even taking the cover off my bike will set off the preliminary beeps. While there's no place on my scooter to actually lock the wheel, I found a bar to clip it to. I'm confident that anyone who decides to touch my bike will be deterred by the alarm and I will here it whether at work or home.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopilicious

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in November 2017. My bikeis kept outside. Everytime the lock gets wet, the alarm cannot be controlled. It makes a really high pitched noise which isn't the alarm sound itself. The only way to stop the noise is to allow the lock to dry. Or, just remove the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof. Didn't even last a month.
customer_reviews.text: So this worked great for about a week. Then the alarm went from 110db to 10db. I left my bike in the rain once, and now the battery is fried. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Riki

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, good quality , you can hear hear when the alarm goes off but its very sensitive to any movement. Where i live gets a bit windy plus the cover of my motorcycle makes more movement for the motorcycle when windy. so I had to take the batteries off. otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mpg

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Strong. Works easily. Thieves would have to remove wheel or lift entire bike to steal. Recently traveled and was comfortable knowing bike was secure in motel lot.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bad: - The motion sensor is not very sensitive at all. You can mount the bike fairly aggressively and it will not activate the alarm. It would be nice to be able to adjust the sensitivity. - The alarm is not very loud at all. The good: - It is functional - It comes with extra batteries (in a cool magazine) - It comes with three keys.
customer_reviews.author: robatron

customer_reviews.title: Alarm is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Alarm is unreliable. When I first got it it seemed almost too sensitive. Now almost nothing sets it off. The wind constantly makes the warning chirp go off yet when that same wind blew the bike over onto its side, nothing. Physical lock is still holding up though so I guess it has that going for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathamar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase for any motorcycle. I use this for home and work, I don't have a garage at home and this ease's my mind. It's waterproof and probably drop proof (dropped once on accident because jacket was unzipped from waist height). It's small enough to fit in your motorcycle jacket pocket and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: TechyDude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price! Alarm is really sensitive which is what i wanted. The silver one appears like a normal silver but the one I recieved was a chrome color! Looks awesome on my motorcycle and serves its purpose properly..
customer_reviews.author: Carramrod

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Received product and it didn't even last one month when it did completely and doesn't function anymore. I have this on the front tire on my scooter with a scooter cover to protect from the elements when one day I heard it a low noise when it was this malfunctioning now it doesn't work at all, GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Low sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound that it makes its not loud enough. I can sit and start my motorcycle and the alarm still dont start.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Zhelev

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: This lock is a simple device which makes a loud noise when someone tries to move/touch or remove the lock with out the key. It is sensitive enough to detect slight movements without making false alarms. When touched once it makes a noise with few bursts of sound to indicate that the lock is there and if you still proceed to touch the bike or move the lock it starts beeping. The sound is loud to grab attention just wish it was a tad bit louder.
customer_reviews.author: Abhijit Shinde

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Anytime I lock it the sound starts off immediately and doesn’t turn off until I disengage the lock
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Affordable Lock
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy and well built. The alarm is very loud, which is good, and it comes with everything you need - three keys, an extra battery pack, a carrying case (granted it seems to be made with pretty cheap material and the lock feels almost as if it will fall right through), and a cable to remind you not to ride away with the lock still in place. Great bang for the buck in my opinion, hopefully I don't have to test it under a real life theft scenario.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment so you always worry little about your toy. This gives me piece of mind. Very little movement and it goes off. Nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow. It’s legit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. There is a specific locking position for the key, and it’s an insert and push to lock it. No turning required. Only turn the key to unlock it or if it’s going off. Not waterproof? The thing itself is pretty resistant. AND, it comes in a strap covered lock bag you can put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite Sensitive Enough
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other reviews on here, my experience with this lock is that it is not quite sensitive enough. This lock will not go off with wind, rain, or a flapping cover, but also won’t go off when the bike is shifted or even sat on. It only goes off with an abrupt jerk of the handlebars. Otherwise this lock works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Busacker

customer_reviews.title: Motion detection is weak
customer_reviews.text: You have to bump this bike VERY hard for motion detection to go off. The alarm is 5/10. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: J&A

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with the disc brake thus far. I use it on my SV1000s. It goes on easy and the reminder cable helps with the sensitivity. It not only lets you know the disc brake is on, but it also seems to aid the brake’s alarm In going off when the bike is moved or touched. The alarm isn’t super loud, but it’s loud enough to be annoying and more than likely scare someone off. For the money and overall value, can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonetta C

customer_reviews.title: Good theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Since this was my first Disc alarm, the instructions didn't say how to use the cable. I had to You-tube several spots to finally find out it's purpose and how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Alarm does not shut off by itself.
customer_reviews.text: Once the alarm goes off, it doesnt turn off, the alarm rings nonstop. Theres no way of stopping it. I was really disappointed in this lock. Would have been perfect if there was a way to unlock it and shut the alarm off.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Deckard

customer_reviews.title: Small Price to Pay!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well for the price. I like that this is a visual and audio deterrent...but it won't stop thieves. I hope they come out with a blue tooth feature that will alert by phone (when bikers are indoors). Willing to pay extra for that type of security!!
customer_reviews.author: Willie Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product for securing my motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for securing my motorcycle. I thought the motion sensor would be more sensitive. It is still a great device for securing my bike and deterring anyone from even trying to steal it.
customer_reviews.author: GWS

customer_reviews.title: Very sensitive and very loud
customer_reviews.text: It is very sensitive. I was a little concerned that since it only cost $25 that it would not be very good, but I installed it on my bike and then remembered that I still had my key in the ignition and when I touched the key it did the warning key and then when I removed it, the alarm went off. It made me feel a lot better about keeping my bike outside. I can hear it from inside easily. I would highly recommend this product, especially to those storing their bikes outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Manley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and is load enough to wake surrounding RV's and neighbors in an RV park for sure so I'm sure that would be the same in a lot of other areas. (Installed on a 2018 Kona mountain bike through brake rotors.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product . Easy to use portable and with a reminder cable just adds to how great this product is
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Greenhalgh

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock. Heavy and loud as all get out
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock. Heavy and loud as all get out. I was also very pleased to see that it came with a storage bag and an extra set of batteries (it takes 6 watch batteries). Time will tell if it holds up, but for now I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SBD

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty sturdy. But when it’s cold out
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty sturdy. But when it’s cold out, the alarm doesn’t sound.
customer_reviews.author: Chelithanii

customer_reviews.title: It works as a good bonus feature besides my main alarm this is a ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as a good bonus feature besides my main alarm this is a good feature to have when I turn off my main alarm when it rains still have an active alarm
customer_reviews.author: Young curious

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly the way I thought it would. I had my doubts that it might not ring the alarm and wasn't sure how sensitive it will be. But IMO it worked perfectly fine and have had no issues what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mayur Banwasi

customer_reviews.title: great sensibilty, battery lasting and loud!!
customer_reviews.text: item delivered in May 2019, this review written in October 2019. so far the product has held to its standards. I haven't had to change the battery once, the alarm is loud and it even gives the "warning" fir beep when the little lizards of my patio stand on it. definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Small price for big piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Definitely attention-getting wish the motion sensitivity was a little more sensitive but is acceptable
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: It could be louder. Also its not that sensitive to shock or motion. I can take the cover off my bike without the alarm going off.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm alternative to the more expensive one.
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is loud and works just as described. I purchased two for both my street motorcycles. Well worth the price for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: richsal

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work GREAT at 1st...till key would not turn
customer_reviews.text: Used it 4 times...4th something happened inside the lock cylinder while it was attached to my bike. Had to break the lock to get it off the bike. Luckily I was at home whee I had tools, if I was anywhere else...UGH
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: It seems to do it's job, but it's very sensitive and goes off as I set it on my disk brake.
customer_reviews.text: This device is pretty loud. It does a loud beep when I try to lock it, and god forbid I touch it or try to stretch the cord over my clutch, it will go off.
customer_reviews.author: Yury Sakovich

customer_reviews.title: Not overly sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Works well and doesn't go off constantly. Seems to be very sturdy. The included cord is very helpful in reminding me not to ride off with the lock on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris s.

customer_reviews.title: SENSITIVE and NOT WATER RESISTANCE.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty motion sensitive, so it'll alarm even on a windy day. It's not water resistant tho.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great but not as loud as expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! It is VERY sensitive. Sometimes rain sets it off. I don’t mind; I’d rather that than the opposite. My 4 stars are for it not being very loud. I can hear it in my apartment, but I don’t think it’s as loud as claimed. Then again, I am hard of hearing, so who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Alarm is LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable first line of defense against motorcycle theft, and this little tool comes quite handy. I don't think it's meant to be used as a theft deterrent by itself, but it definitely works as advertised. Sturdy lock that starts blasting sound if it's moved or vibrated. I like that better than the ones that don't have any sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this devise every time I park my bike. It is easy to use and the alarm is very sensitive. If you want extra security for your bike this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice and loud. I can hear it from inside. Very sensitive also so I don't have to worry about it not going off. It seems very sturdy and I like that it can be locked without using the key.
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: Great security for your motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Great product for some extra piece of mind. It’s like having an alarm for your bike, just the right amount of sensitivity, so no false alarms and volume is very loud. Has held up well in rainy weather as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jkhan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Comes with extra batteries. Shock sensor is good. Not super loud but is noticeable. Thieves can't push bike to steal.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Way heavier then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Way heavier then I expected, feels super durable. My new bike got delivered with a dead battery. When the dealer came around to swap out the battery for a new one, he saw this product and said "Those are the best. Everyone should use those" Can't argue with that! The alarm is a decent volume as well. This definitely exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: laferna

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding durability. Others I bought broken easily and NO product support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid disk lock and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great added theft protection. Solid disk lock, well built. Came well packed with a pouch for storage. Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wonnacott

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday gift for any motorcycle lover!
customer_reviews.text: My father's birthday is coming up and I know he needed a little up grade with his security on his motorcycle. So I figure to upgrade his old metal lock with this one and when I showed it to him he absolutely loved it! We live in NYC so you always have to be cautious and the sound on this thing really shakes you up. Thank you for making him smile!
customer_reviews.author: Shanti

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Purchased to use for Amerivespa. Was able to lock by scooter along with two others. Since mine had the alarm, we were all alterted to problems. Easy to use, great instructions.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this as added security for my Honda Rebel 500. It's easy to use. Is made of quality material, and is SUPER sensitive! 3 keys and a carrying case, plus spare batteries. An excellent deal! Especially for the added piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: P. Scott Schoepflin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, could be a little louder but will still definitely deter a would be thief. Mine went off just tapping on the handlebars so its pretty sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast problem free delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product....I haven't really used it yet other than here at home. My scooter was shipped to me with a stripped gear plug hole, so it leaks. Sucks cause its brand new and I can't ride it yet. But I'm happy with my Purchase and delivery of my anti-theft device.hopefully I can use it soon. Thank you highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ROSARY Medlin

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Good solid lock. Feels secure. I only wish it was a little louder. I'm a light sleeper though. I think it's loud enough to wake me and I'm on the 3rd floor. I park my bike outside my house under the balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Daslickest

customer_reviews.title: Haven't set it off yet but the warning beep is loud and clear. Good construction, easy to use and "install".
customer_reviews.text: Haven't set it off yet but the warning beep is loud and clear. Good construction, easy to use and "install". I appreciate the strapped carrying pouch it came with.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Sensitive, kind of loud, heavy, bag broke when I tried to use it, cheap bag, Clips on brakes easily. Can’t attest to water proofing because I have a cover and park under awnings when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does it’s job although it needs better waterproofing I’ve had mine 2 months now and had ...
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s job although it needs better waterproofing I’ve had mine 2 months now and had to change batteries already after opening it to change them it was rusted and corroded had to scrape it off and clean the contacts still works like a champ since then I’ve purchased a motorcycle weatherproof cover A handlebar brake lock and another manufactures disc brake lock with sirens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: It meets my expectation . For 1st time movement, gives few beeps. If it senses motion again, starts giving loud alarm. And then goes off automatically after around 20-30 seconds if no more motion detected.
customer_reviews.author: S M Towhidul Islam

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I feel like people are less likely to mess with the bike once it beeps... though I’m not sure I will hear it all the way to my bedroom at night. I live in an apt and bike is outside in our parking spot. But still, good deterrent. Could be louder
customer_reviews.author: Krysta R

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought to protect the bike while away and traveling. Easy to use except once on bike and locked- it has a constant beep/ chirp sound. Also the alarm isn’t loud as expected.
customer_reviews.author: SUN

product_meta.title: MYSBIKER Motorcycle Alarm Disc Brake Lock, Anti Theft Motorcycle Wheel Padlock with 2m Reminder Cable 110db Alarm Sound Zinc Alloy Process for 6 mm Motorcycles Bicycles Scooter Honda Yamaha Harley
product_meta.description:
Color:silver| Size:MediumSilver Knight for Your Motorbike 
MysBiker Alarm Disc Lock-Silver Knight is a practical solution for bikers to protect their beloved motorbikes or scooters while parking outside or at home.Made of high quality stainless steel case, guarantee high security and firmness for your motorbike

Durable and Waterproof
Made in waterproof stainless steel case,the inner silicone rubber gaskets on the edge of the alarm device effectively keep out the rain or splash.With waterproof function,keep working in rainy days and never get rusty.

Steps To Use: 
1. Press the lock button to lock the disc brake,and you will hear the sound "beep". When the lock is vibrated, the lock will give off an alarm "beep beep beep" three times in case this is an accident.When vibrated again,Silver Knight will give off an continuous shrill alarm for 10-12 seconds.And it keeps alarm with serial vibration.
2.Silver Knight will cost you 3-5 seconds to open the lock ,if the key does not match,it will give off an alarm. Use the right key to open the lock,the alarm will stop at once. 
3.The Reminder cable/cord has a loop at each end,to connect your disc lock to your hand grip.It will remind you to remove the lock when you are going to for a ride.

Battery Replacement
When the lock no longer make sharp alarms,instead produce constant sound "Ge Ge Ge…", that means the battery is going to be exhausted and you need to replace them. Please use the Mini Wrench we provided to spin out the fours screw at the bottom,take away the shell and replace the battery. Pay attention to the anode "+" and cathode "-".

Product Specification:
Size:3.5"x 2.7"x1.6"
Material:High grade Alloy steel
Battery:Zinc battery(6pc inside,6pc back up）

What You Get:
MysBiker Alarm Disc Lock*1
Mini Wrench *1
Lock Keys*3
Zinc batteries*12(6pc inside,6pc back up)
2 m/6ft Reminder Cable*1
feature_bullets: ▶Make Thieves‘Lost’: MysBiker Alarm Disc Lock-Silver Knight is a practical solution for bikers to protect their beloved motorbikes or bikes while parking outside or at home. The Motorbike lock up to 110 decibel alarm will automatically activate upon sensing any vibration or shock,keeps your belongings safe and sound.

▶Easy to Notice: The 6mm Pin Brake Disc Wheel Security Lock enclosed 2m/6ft disc lock reminder cable which is designed to attach to the brake or clutch lever and locked disc lock when you leave your motorcycle or bikes.Reminds you to remove the lock,and prevents potential damage caused by riding away while the disc lock is engaged. easy to lock with one-press operation, immediately The lock goes into alarm mode and you'll hear a "beep" sound. When detects a vibration, It has a warning triple "be

▶Wide Application Range: MysBiker Anti-theft Motorcycle Disc Brake Lock fits Most Motorcycles,Scooters, Cruiser,Chopper, Sport Bike, Racing Bike. Such as: Harley,Aprilia, BMW, Buell,Honda, Kawasaki,Suzuki, KTM,Triumph and Yamaha.Harley Davidson, Yamaha FJR / YZF-R3 2017 / Raptor 700, 2017 Honda Groom, BMW G310R, 2017 Kawasaki Z125 / Kawasaki Ninja 250r 500r 650 2017 2012, 2016 Indian Scout Sixty, Suzuki GSX-R 600 / GSX-R1000, Triumph Bonneville Streets mat, Victory Cross-country, Honda shadow sp

▶Strong and Durable:This brake lock is constructed with forged stainless steel and is secured with a 14mm double-locking, carbide-reinforced hardened-steel locking pin.The disc wheel lock with waterproof function,keep working in rainy days and never get rusty.

▶Long Life Use: Each Motorcycle lock is pre-fitted with 6 LR44 batteries and extra 6 pcs batteries,and 3 pcs brass security keys.To replace the battery,you can use the mini wrench to remove the 4 screws at the bottom(see picture #6),then change the battery inside.

specifications.Special Features: Pakage include: 1*alarm disc lock with battery set pre-installed, 1x 4ft reminder cable, 1x Spare battery set, 1x Carrying pouch, 1x Allen wrench, 110dB alarm sound to fight off the thieves suspects, 6.7mm locking pin, lock you can live with outside in a populated city, Intelligent alarming system with loud warning beeps, Easy to mount and use, 6pcs preinstalled batteries and 6 back-up batteries, spare relacement battery included,, Built with alloy aluminum body, sealed against moisture, dust and dirt
specifications.Vehicle Service Type: Dirt Bike, Cruiser/ Touring, Street Bike, Triumph Bonneville Streetsmat, Yamaha ZR-9 / Yamaha FJR / 2017 Yamaha YZF-R3 R6, It will fit the majority of motorcycles and recreational vehicles, as well as bikes with disc brakes, where the disc is 1/4'' thick and drilled., Harley Davidson Fatboy / Harley Davidson Ultra Limited, Kawasaki Ninja 500r / Ninja 650 / Ninja 300 / Kawasaki Vulcan Custom 900, Triumph Bonneville Streetsmat, Honda CBR1000RR / Honda XR650L,
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,275 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
